channel.title: Help please, It's not a complicated question
channel.description:
Hi. Earlier today someone tried crashing my server. They were creating tons of accounts in a very short period amount of time and other things. I need help, Does anyone here know where I can get an anti-crasher? please help :D (This is a 317 source)
-Deleter164

item.title: Help please, It's not a complicated question
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:4, topic:355645”]That wont stop any spammers, only invalid names.[/quote]And you can also use an array for it.

Read full topic
item.source: Help please, It's not a complicated question

item.title: Help please, It's not a complicated question
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Also, add this code to your server’s if playername.contains

                        ///////////////////
                    //         //
                    //Custom Firewall//
                    //         //
                    ///////////////////
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-")
    || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("-")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("-")
    || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("+")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("_")
    || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("¯")
    || playerName.contains("a") || playerName.contains("ß") || playerName.contains("G")
    || playerName.contains("p") || playerName.contains("S") || playerName.contains("s")
    || playerName.contains("µ") || playerName.contains("t") || playerName.contains("F")
    || playerName.contains("T") || playerName.contains("O") || playerName.contains("d")
    || playerName.contains("8") || playerName.contains("f") || playerName.contains("e")
    || playerName.contains("n") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("±")
    || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("(")
    || playerName.contains(")") || playerName.contains("÷") || playerName.contains("˜")
    || playerName.contains("°") || playerName.contains("·") || playerName.contains("·")
    || playerName.contains("v") || playerName.contains("n") || playerName.contains("²")
    || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("•") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("¤")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("¶") || playerName.contains("§")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(" ") || playerName.contains("!")
    || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$")
    || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/")
    || playerName.contains(":") || playerName.contains(";") || playerName.contains("<")
    || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("?")
    || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("_") || playerName.contains("`")
    || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("|") || playerName.contains("}")
    || playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("Ç")
    || playerName.contains("ü") || playerName.contains("é") || playerName.contains("â")
    || playerName.contains("ä") || playerName.contains("à") || playerName.contains("å")
    || playerName.contains("ç") || playerName.contains("ê") || playerName.contains("ë")
    || playerName.contains("è") || playerName.contains("ï") || playerName.contains("î")
    || playerName.contains("ì") || playerName.contains("Ä") || playerName.contains("Å")
    || playerName.contains("å") || playerName.contains("æ") || playerName.contains("Æ")
    || playerName.contains("É") || playerName.contains("ô") || playerName.contains("ö")
    || playerName.contains("ò") || playerName.contains("û") || playerName.contains("ù")
    || playerName.contains("ÿ") || playerName.contains("Ö") || playerName.contains("Ü")
    || playerName.contains("¢") || playerName.contains("£") || playerName.contains("¥")
    || playerName.contains("P") || playerName.contains("ƒ") || playerName.contains("á")
    || playerName.contains("í") || playerName.contains("ó") || playerName.contains("ú")
    || playerName.contains("ñ") || playerName.contains("Ñ") || playerName.contains("ª")
    || playerName.contains("º") || playerName.contains("¿") || playerName.contains("¬")
    || playerName.contains("¬") || playerName.contains("½") || playerName.contains("¼")
    || playerName.contains("¡") || playerName.contains("«") || playerName.contains("»")
    || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("¦")
    || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("¦")
    || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+")
    || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("+")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-")
    || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("¦")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-")
    || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("¦") || playerName.contains("-")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("-")
    || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("+")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+")
    || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains("+") //473
    || playerName.contains("È") || playerName.contains("É") || playerName.contains("Ê")
    || playerName.contains("Ë") || playerName.contains("Ì") || playerName.contains("Í")
    || playerName.contains("Î") || playerName.contains("Ï") || playerName.contains("Ð")
    || playerName.contains("Ñ") || playerName.contains("Ò") || playerName.contains("Ó")
    || playerName.contains("Ô") || playerName.contains("Õ") || playerName.contains("Ö")
    || playerName.contains("Ï") || playerName.contains("Ø") || playerName.contains("Ú") //0218
    || playerName.contains("Û") || playerName.contains("Ü") || playerName.contains("Ý") //0221
    || playerName.contains("Þ") || playerName.contains("ß") || playerName.contains("à")
    || playerName.contains("â") || playerName.contains("ã") || playerName.contains("ä") //0228
    || playerName.contains("I AM NOBUS") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("TOM                                                          ERROR!!!! ERROR!!!!! ERROR!!!!!")
    || playerName.contains("©") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("™") 
    || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains("")) {

That will stop anybody trying to create a name with those characters. People that have those characters in their name and they log on to your server when it doesn’t have that code will come up as Invalid Username.

Read full topic
